text: @senatemajldr @BretBaier .@senatemajldr Plz discuss your serious efforts to provide protection liability to companies that employ essential workers. Most Americans are horrified with the spread of COVID-19 due to lack of #PPE and social distance in nurse homes, meat processing plants, and prisons.
